INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: With women of child bearing age, risk of transformation of the acitretin into etretinate, a powerful agent of birth defects and malformations with a very prolonged half life (120 days), exposing the woman to a major risk of these birth defects and malformations of the child in case of pregnancy, during the treatment and two months after it ends.
Risk of increase of the hepatotoxicity of the methotrexate
INTERACTION.COMMENT: If administering these substances together is judged necessary, strengthen liver function testing.
